short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Atlassian Migration Assistant simplifies transitioning from on-premise Jira and Confluence to Jira Cloud and Confluence Cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension remaps your on-premise Jira and Confluence instance URLs to their cloud counterparts by rewriting the jira.yourcompany.com to Atlassian cloud URLs.
